name: A Collection of Christmas Carols
body:
You can buy the finished book on Amazon.com [here](http://www.amazon.com/Collection-Christmas-Carols-Benjamin-Bloomfield/dp/1475217552/) or you can get the spiral bound edition through Lulu, [here](http://www.lulu.com/content/paperback-book/a-collection-of-christmas-carols-%2885x11%29/12933490).

Eventually, I may post individual PDFs and MIDI files, but I don't have them right now.  The PDFs of the book as a whole are available in these formats:
* [Tablet version (no margins)](http://acollectionofchristmascarols.com/pdfs/!playbook.pdf)
* [6.14x9.21](http://acollectionofchristmascarols.com/pdfs/!!scribd%206.14.pdf)
* [6x9](http://acollectionofchristmascarols.com/pdfs/!!scribd%206x9.pdf)
* [8.5x11](http://acollectionofchristmascarols.com/pdfs/ccc.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
